modName: The Hall of Doors Fast Travel Mod
summary: The hall of doors has shortcuts to some of the most important places in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
The hall of doors is an underground hallway that has shortcuts to 20 of the most important places in skyrim.  It allows you to fast travel without using the map.  But beware, the hall is crawling with dangerous creatures.  You will have to get past them if you want to use it to get around skyrim.  

Note: The hall of doors version 1.50 is now available!  It adds 10 new shortcuts to the hall of doors.  It also adds a blacksmith forge so you can forge armor and weapons on the go.   

The easiest way to get to the hall of doors if you haven\'t been there before would be to go through the trap door in farengar\'s office in dragonsreach.  It\'s hidden behind the map of skyrim but shouldn\'t be too hard to find.  It is locked but the key is somewhere very nearby.

The hall of doors has shortcuts to

version 1.50
Jorrvaskr the Companions hall in Whiterun
Jorrvaskr living quarters
The Underforge in whiterun
Sovngarde 
The Guardian Stones
Winterhold College Arch Mages Quarters
The Bards College in Solitude
The Dawnstar Sanctuary
Theives Guild Headquarters in Riften
The Atronach Forge in the Midden at the college of winterhold

version 1.00
Dragonsreach in whiterun
The palace of the kings in windhelm
mistveil keep in riften
the white hall in dawnstar
the jarls longhouse in winterhold
the jarls longhouse in falkreath
hightmoonhall in morthal
the blue palace in solitude
understone keep in markarth
high hrother
castle dour in solitude
the hall of elements at the college of winterhold
the hall of attainment at the college of winterhold
the hall of countenance at the college of winterhold
the sleeping giant inn in riverwood
sky haven temple
the dark brotherhood sanctuary
blackreach
the ragged flagon in riften
the top of the throat of the world

Known Bugs
-This mod can screw up some quests.  If this happens load your previous save and use the map to get to where you need to go.
- If you use the hall of doors to get back to dragonsreach right before the battle of whiterun during the legion quest after delivering Jarl Baalgruf\'s axe to Ulfric Stormcloak it will cause the imperial commander to disapear.  Go through the front door to avoid this.

Note that this is not a cheating mod.  You cannot use the hall to fast travel to a place you have not been before.  You have to go to that place first and then find the key to the trap door in that area that leads back to the hall of doors.  After that you can travel back and forth from that place as many times as you please.
author: TheBlackHandofSilence
